title: ENERtec Asia 2024: Driving Sustainable Urban and Industrial Energy Transition in Southeast Asia - PR Newswire
summary: Informa Markets is rebranding its ASEAN M&E trade show to ENERtec Asia, focusing on sustainable energy solutions and showcasing technologies like renewable power generation, energy storage, and electric vehicle solutions. title: OR launches new PTT Station Flagship as a gateway to embrace more diversification and pursue its objectives of ... - PR Newswire
summary: PTT Oil and Retail Business Plc. (OR) has launched a new PTT Station Flagship in Bangkok, promoting a 'Living Community' concept. The station incorporates sustainable practices like solar energy, biodegradable cups, and an AI-CCTV system to calculate CO2 emissions. OR also offers various amenities and services, including electric vehicle charging stations and a showcase for electric vehicles, showcasing its commitment to both sustainable practices and customer needs.

title: We are committed to championing environmentally sustainable practices: Hitachi Energy India - Your Gateway to ... - T&D India
summary: Hitachi Energy India is focused on sustainable energy solutions, particularly in the transformer sector. They are making significant advancements in RIP bushing production and promoting the use of biodegradable insulation fluids like esters in their transformers, demonstrating their commitment to green technologies. The company is also making strides in localization, particularly for highly specialized transformers like HVDC converter transformers, contributing to the 'Make in India' initiative.

title: Thaioil and Chulalongkorn University Forge Collaborative Research Agreements - Bangkok Post
summary: Thai Oil Public Company Limited (Thaioil) has signed two research and development (R&D) agreements with Chulalongkorn University. One agreement is with the Petroleum and Petrochemical College and focuses on enhancing business opportunities and developing new technologies. The second agreement is with the Faculty of Pharmaceutical Sciences and aims to develop disinfectant products, aligning with Thaioil's strategy of diversifying its business portfolio.
